thread.title: My first stay downtown
thread.title_full: My first stay downtown - Review of Walker Hotel Greenwich Village, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: 822muniraha
title: My first stay downtown
text:
A charming hotel. Excellent staff and reception. The room was rather small for two people. Delightful lobby area. Restauant service a little slow. However, it was most enjoyable being at the Walker.
Thank you.
Room Tip: Better vacuuming needed. Hosekeeping a little shoddy. See more room tips
